If not, see 32 <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. */ 33 34 35 #ifndef _SSP_H 36 #define _SSP_H 1 37 38 #if _FORTIFY_SOURCE > 0 && __OPTIMIZE__ > 0 \ 39 && defined __GNUC__ \ 40 && (__GNUC__ > 4 || (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 1)) \ 41 && !defined __cplusplus 42 # if _FORTIFY_SOURCE == 1 43 # define __SSP_FORTIFY_LEVEL 1 44 # elif _FORTIFY_SOURCE > 1 45 # define __SSP_FORTIFY_LEVEL 2 46 # endif 47 #endif 48 49 #if __SSP_FORTIFY_LEVEL > 0 50 # include <stddef.h> 51 # define __ssp_bos(ptr) __builtin_object_size (ptr, __SSP_FORTIFY_LEVEL > 1) 52 # define __ssp_bos0(ptr) __builtin_object_size (ptr, 0) 53 54 # define __SSP_REDIRECT(name, proto, alias) \ 55 name proto __asm__ (__SSP_ASMNAME (#alias)) 56 # define __SSP_ASMNAME(cname) __SSP_ASMNAME2 (__USER_LABEL_PREFIX__, cname) 57 # define __SSP_ASMNAME2(prefix, cname) __SSP_ASMNAME3 (prefix) cname 58 # define __SSP_ASMNAME3(prefix) #prefix 59 60 # undef __SSP_HAVE_VSNPRINTF 61 62 extern void __chk_fail (void) __attribute__((__noreturn__)); 63 #endif 64 65 #endif /* _SSP_H */
